title: Chard and Mozzarella Lasagne
ingredients: ['extra-virgin olive oil, as needed', '1 onion, chopped', '2 carrots, grated', '1 red pepper, thinly sliced', '8-10 leaves chard, stems removed and discarded', '500g grated mozarella cheese', '500g lasagne sheets', 'salt and pepper to taste', 'water, as needed']
